Account Officer Job at Aspom Travels and Tours




        
    

        
        Aspom Travels and Tours is a travel company that offers a wide range of services to facilitate both individual and corporate travel plans. Our services include Visa assistance, Flight reservations, Hotel bookings, Birth services and Planning different tour packages to suit the needs and preferences of our customers. Our agency is committed to providing efficient and high-quality services atcompetitive rates.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Manage and maintain financial records, including accounting payable and receiveable.
	Prepare financial report, inclusing balance sheet and income statements.
	Analyze financial data to inform business decisions.
	Ensure compliance with financial regulation and company policies.
	Collaborate with internal teams to ensure financial planning.


Requirements


	Minimum of HND / B.SC in Accounting, Statistics or any related field.
	2-3 years of experience in Accounting or finance.
	Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
	Ability to work as independently as part of a team.
	Porficient in Acounting software, including QuickBooks or similar.


Benefits and Incentives


	Competitive Salary.
	Opportunities for career growth and development.
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
	Performance-based bonuses and inncentives.
	Professional training and development programs.

	You will be a strategic partner to leadership and a champion of employee engagement in a high-growth, tech-driven environment.

	Develop and implement a comprehensive HR strategy aligned with the overall business vision and mission and long-term goals.

	Develop and implement a comprehensive HR strategy aligned with the overall business vision and mission and long-term goals.

	Drive alignment of HR policies, procedures, and culture across the organization while ensuring flexibility where needed.
	Oversee all core HR functions, including talent acquisition, learning and development, performance management, compensation and benefits, succession planning, and employee relations.
	Ensure efficient and compliant HR operations across all departments.
